column4: seems like my new netbook has actually two graphic cards, does that make sense ? seems to have an Intel GMA 3150, aswell as a Ion Next Gen
It seems like my new netbook has actually two graphic cards, does that make sense ? it seems to have an Intel GMA 3150, aswell as a Ion Next Gen, but why would it have 2 graphic cards ?
(i read it on internet, didnt check myself)
one for oomph the other one to save power. it switsches between the two
